subtitleNullable: Annual sales data of a fictitious pizza place.
descriptionNullable:
This is the official dataset for the Maven Pizza Challenge. It constitutes of annual sales data of a fictitious pizza place, including the date and time of each order and the pizzas served, with additional details on the type, size, quantity, price, and ingredients.
Link: https://www.mavenanalytics.io/data-playground
Source: Vincent Arel-Bundock (Rdatasets)

## Contents
The dataset has 5 .csv files and 4 tables.
* The order_details tables has 48621 rows containing order details regarding pizza type and order quantity.
* The orders table record the datetime indicators of the 21351 orders.
* The pizza_types table specifies the category, ingredients information about the 33 different pizza types offered by the pizza place.
* The pizzas table has 97 rows containing the pricing details of pizza based on the size and pizza type.

## Collection Methodology
The public dataset is available on the Maven Analytics website in the data playground platform, which is an online resource of sample datasets, hand-picked by Maven instructors. All of the Data Playground datasets are completely free and are available for everyone to learn with.
